jest.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: something you say that is intended to be funny, not serious
jest.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: I wasn’t sure whether to treat her words as a jest.
His serious face told me that he was not speaking in jest.
jest.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to say things that you do not really mean in order to amuse people
jest.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: ‘Do I look as if I am jesting?’ she asked, her face pale and tense.
